name: Ghostta Go!
description:
In this game, you control a ghost doing a normal person thing: running in three lanes. At least, I think that's a normal person thing? All the characters in those mobile games seem to enjoy doing it.

Walls exist can exist in either the human realm or the ghost realm. If this hurts your head... just avoid the semi-transparent walls and you'll be fine!

Your score's in the top-left corner, and it doesn't get saved, so you'd better have a good memory.

Made for Halloween Jam 2021. Yes, I ran out of time.  :)

Takes a minute to load on slow devices; a few seconds on everything else. No sound on iOS.

Controls

Arrow or number keys to change lanes.

Swipe left and right to change lanes.

Assets
  • Font: Groovy Ghosties
  • Model: good ghost halloween
  • Music: High Spirits by Jagex; refined by OldScapeMusic
  • Sound: Bonk
  • Sound: Scary Ghost Moan
  • Sprite: Mouse left button
  • Texture: Sandy Trail
  • Texture: Mask Fash Face
  • Texture: Red Brick
